plot: The Pearsons gather to celebrate Baby Jack's first birthday.

The events surrounding first birthdays or births in three different time periods are presented. In the past, Jack and Rebecca are not only celebrating Jack's thirty-seventh birthday with a modification to their usual routine but the first birthday of the Big Three. It can't help but be a bittersweet occasion for both of them, leading to them turning to an old friend for advice on how to deal with the bitter in light of the sweet. In the future, Lucy has just gone into labor a week late. Someone important to both Lucy and Jack rushes to their side after having her latest "movie star" date. And in the present, the entire Pearson family is descending on Los Angeles for Jack's first birthday, which coincides with Kevin's one-year sobriety. While Kate, Toby, and Jack welcome the family, they have a special Damon threesome-only secret task, out of which Kate and Toby discuss a not-yet-broached topic regarding their family. An announcement by Rebecca has the potential to overtake the day, while a series of events threaten Kevin making it to one year.—Huggo
